aka: Murder By The Lake – The Fourth Woman

cast.name: 马提亚斯·科布林 Matthias Koeberlin
诺拉·冯·瓦尔茨特滕 Nora von Waldstätten
伊内兹·比约格·大卫 Inez Björg David
玛格丽特·提塞尔 Margarete Tiesel
亚历山大·库昂 Alexander Khuon
薇蕾娜·阿尔顿布格尔 Verena Altenberger

trans_title: Murder By The Lake – The Fourth Woman
introduction: The dead body of a woman is found in a hops field - presented by the perpetrator hanging in a spider web on a seven meter high scaffold. It is not the first case of this kind: apparently Jutta Reike is the fourth victim of a serial killer. Micha Oberländer and Hannah Zeiler find out that the victim doesn't correspond physically to the pattern of the other homicides. Is this the crime of a copycat? When a swimmer is run over brutally by a motorboat on the lake, a surprise is awaiting Zeiler and Oberländer: they find evidence in the car of the victim Dietrich Falkner, that he might be the sought-after serial killer. During a house search trophies of the four victims are found. Everything seems to fit, until Zeiler and Oberländer find out that the trophies of the fourth victim are false. Now it is obvious: there must be a second murderer, who not only killed Dietrich Falkner.
